body:
Declare  @HareketTipID int, @FisTurID int, @StokAmbarID int,@StokTipID int,@AmbarID int ,@Miktar_Mt Decimal(18,6),@Miktar_Kg  Decimal(18,6),@Miktar_Ad int,@SPMiktar Decimal(18,6)
Set @FisTurID  =14
 Declare c Cursor Local For

 	Select  SA.StokAmbarID ,S.StokTipID,SA.AmbarID,SA.Miktar_Mt,Sa.Miktar_Kg,SA.Miktar_Ad,
	Case 
	When  S.AnaOlcuBirimID = 1 Then  SA.Miktar_Mt
	When  S.AnaOlcuBirimID = 2 Then  SA.Miktar_Kg
	When  S.AnaOlcuBirimID = 3 Then  SA.Miktar_Ad end
	
	 From  IT06_StokAmbar SA
	INNER JOIN IT05_PartiRotaM PRM On PRM.IsEmriNo = SA.IsEmriNo
	INNER JOIN IT01_Ambarlar A On A.AmbarID = SA.AmbarID
	INNER JOIN IT06_StokKarti SK On SK.UrunID = SA.UrunID
	INNER JOIN IT06_Stoklar S On S.UrunTID = SK.UrunTID
	Where PRM.Durumu = 99 Order By SA.AddDate Desc--7161713
 		
 Open c
 Fetch Next From c Into @StokAmbarID,@StokTipID,@AmbarID,@Miktar_Mt,@Miktar_Kg,@Miktar_Ad,@SPMiktar
 While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 Begin


Exec PSP01_CreateHareketTip @StokTipID = @StokTipID, @AmbarID = @AmbarID, @TrAmbarID = null, @FisTurID = @FisTurID, @IsFason = 0,
							@IsDepoGiris = 0, @IsDepoCikis = 0,
                            @IsIsletmeIciTransfer = 0, @IsIsletmeyeGiris = 0, @IsUretimTuketim = 0, @IsTesislerArasiTransfer = 0, @IsAmbarTeslim = 0,
                            @IsAmbarTeslimIade = 0, @IsIsletmedenHammaddeIade = 0, @HareketTipID = @HareketTipID Output

 

 
Exec PSP06_StokAmbar_DuzeltmeCikis @StokAmbarID = @StokAmbarID, @StokTipID = @StokTipID, @AmbarID = @AmbarID, @SPMiktar = @SPMiktar, @SPOlcuBirimKodu = '', @SPMiktar_Mt = @Miktar_Mt,
                                   @SPMiktar_Kg = @Miktar_Kg, @SPMiktar_Ad = @Miktar_Ad

 

 			
 
 	Fetch Next From c Into @StokAmbarID,@StokTipID,@AmbarID,@Miktar_Mt,@Miktar_Kg,@Miktar_Ad,@SPMiktar
 End
 Close c
 Deallocate c



 SELECT  S.DuzeltmeCikisFisTurID FROM IT15_System S
